column4: if my x gets frozen ive gone in tty1 remove lock and start x again on tty1 but its still running on tty7 how could would i go on about this issue ?
i want to fix or restart x on tty7 not start a new one on tty1
kill X and then you go tty7, in ubuntu X restarts automatically if its killed
but if you dont wat it to respawn you /etc/init.d/gdm stop
